This is the user manual for the Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy ”INSERT-FACHBEGRIFF HERE” . This manual will hopefully answer any questions you might have. You may always access this manual by pressing the menu button on the top-right corner or by selecting “manual” in the main menu

GENERAL CONTROLS:


- Use the touchscreen to navigate through the app.
 - Swipe from the left edge towards the middle to open the navigation menu
 - Pressing either the arrow button at the top left corner or either of the edge hardware buttons will take you back to the previous page


NAVIGATION MENU ENTRIES:


- Index: The index entry can be used to view all available HHGTTG database entries. A list with all database files will pop up once you press the index entry in the navigation menu
 - Characters: This entry will give you detailed entries on all relevant characters within the bookv
 - Diary: SPECIAL EDITION CONTENT – The diary entries of “NAME EINFÜGEN”, integrated into the HHGTTG App!
 - Help: This entry will take you to this manual page
